Text: Of the eight choices to download "Mad Men" this week (so far), two are .rar fakes with passwords which screw up your computer, two have about 8 minutes of the The Lifetime Channel stuck in the middle starting at 36 minutes (although "Mad Men" resumes in full afterwards, there is one .mkv file (I hate that format!), and the other three seem to be reliable .avi files.
uploaded by TvTeam you can trust these guys and also what is wrong with mkv files? It shortens the file size in half with out losing its quality. Learn to use codecs and you're good.
